text:
We chose the cloud
for two main reasons.
Firstly, to speed up the time.

So, we needed
to start off with analytics.

and machine learning
in a scalable way in the company.

And so, we made a choice
from a cloud provider point of view,

in order to run a fast
and quick business.
Secondly, we focused on skills.

Why did we do this?
Because betting on machine learning

means betting on data scientists,
betting on data engineers,

and therefore,
having preconfigured services.

A preconfigured infrastructure has
allowed us to become more streamlined,

so, instead of being on-premises,
or our data center.
Consequently,

it allowed us to pursue
business goals and strategic road maps
through a simple subject like data.

Therefore, it gave us
the opportunity to speed up

data collection phases,
data engineering phases,

and development phases
of a technology stack

that could bring an end-to-end
process

in a short time,
and it allowed us to be proactive
even towards the market.
